jurisdictions.name: Florida

governing_law.template: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of Florida.

must_keywords: state and federal courts in Florida
venue_jurisdiction.template: Venue and jurisdiction are exclusive to the state and federal courts located in Miami-Dade County, Florida.

termination.template: Either party may terminate this Agreement upon written notice for material breach not cured within thirty (30) days.

compliance_checks: Clause references Florida as governing law.
Exclusive venue within Florida is specified.
Termination clause includes notice and 30-day cure period.
jurisdictions.suggestion_block: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of Florida. Venue and jurisdiction are exclusive to the state and federal courts located in Miami-Dade County, Florida. Either party may terminate this Agreement upon written notice for material breach not cured within thirty (30) days.
